name: Lottery.com Inc.
description: Lottery.com Inc. is a technology company that provides a platform for online lottery ticket sales and related services. Founded in 2015, the company aims to modernize the lottery experience by allowing players to purchase lottery tickets online and manage their lottery activities through a user-friendly app. Lottery.com offers access to a variety of lottery games across different states and jurisdictions, providing users with the convenience of playing from anywhere. The platform emphasizes transparency and security, ensuring that players can trust their transactions and the integrity of the games. As the online lottery market continues to grow, Lottery.com positions itself as a leader by leveraging technology to enhance user engagement and simplify the lottery process. The company is committed to responsible gaming and compliance with all applicable regulations, aiming to create a safe environment for players. With a focus on innovation, Lottery.com is continuously developing new features and services to enhance the overall lottery experience, including real-time results, notifications, and the ability to track winnings. The company envisions a future where lottery participation is more accessible and enjoyable for everyone.

seo.meta_description: Lottery.com offers a convenient platform for purchasing lottery tickets online. Explore various lottery games and enjoy a modern lottery experience.

faq.question: What services does Lottery.com provide?
faq.answer: Lottery.com provides a platform for purchasing lottery tickets online and tracking lottery results.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Lottery.com?
faq.answer: Tony DiMatteo is the CEO of Lottery.com Inc.

faq.question: Where is Lottery.com headquartered?
faq.answer: Lottery.com is headquartered in Austin, Texas, USA.
